column4: hi there folks. I'm having a problem with an install.  Mainly getting a resolutiion out of range on my monitor on boot.
grub menu by default uses some of the differnt modes.
you could set it to use a text mode.
does the system actually boot to a desktop/login screen?
ive had a few box's where i cant see grub. but they do boot after the normal delay.
sounds like you got deeper issues then. so what does the sytem do exactly when you power it up?
